storyInfo: It was a simple job, but came with an unexpected compliment. This place isn't as safe as the last one, so why not take a step into a new life?

attributes.content: Over here! I see him.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Coming, coming.
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: Hello.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: It's done. Have a look.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Wow...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Did you really make this?
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: I didn't expect it to be so fast. It's so cute!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I had inspiration when making it, so it took less time than I thought. Any part you'd like to change?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: None whatsoever. It's exactly how I imagined it!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Here's the payment. And have some cookies too—we made them a couple of days ago in the kitchen.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Cookies? Thanks.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: The more I look at it, the more I like it. The collar padding's so nice! Soft and cushy.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: I tried a few materials, but this was the softest.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Picking the right one took quite a bit of time.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Did you make it in the dorms? The materials took up a lot of space, didn't they? I remember getting my head chewed off for taking up too much of the shared space when I was obsessed with toy blocks.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Are your roommates okay with this? I wouldn't want to cause you any trouble.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: No problem, they know about my hobby.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Operator Bibeak submitted an application for a sewing room. Maybe you can talk to the Logistics Department too, so that you don't have to keep everything piled up in your dorm.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Or even open a stall on the ship!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Bibeak only makes clothes for the people she chooses, while Orchid specializes in coordinating outfits. You'd corner the market if you opened up a stall!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: From the look on your face, you haven't talked to them yet?
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: Yeah... Chiave may have recommended me to you, but I've never really thought about making clothes and accessories for anyone else.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: I've never even heard of the two operators you just mentioned.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Well, Bibeak and Orchid are easy to get along with. I'm sure there wouldn't be a problem if you wanted to chat with them.
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: Oh look, that was Bibeak just now!
attributes.name: Caster Operator

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Did someone say my name?
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Oh, er, excuse me.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: This is my storeroom.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: I also invited Orchid today, to teach the other operators design. Feel free to share your sewing knowledge too, if you like.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: I only came because I had a few questions for you. Not sure how much I can teach.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: It's fine. I don't really know enough to teach others either; I just wanted other people to talk about sewing with. Thanks for coming anyway!
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Bibeak? I'm here.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Orchid!
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Who's this?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Hello ma'am, my name is Aosta. I'll be joining the lessons today.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: No need to be so polite. Hard to believe there are still well-mannered kids like you on Rhodes Island... Oh.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: What a relief. I thought I'd be the only male operator here.
attributes.name: Serious Operator

attributes.content: Sorry, did I keep everyone waiting? I brought some snacks for break time.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Thank you. Now let's get started!
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Hushed but excited discussion fills the storeroom, as everyone inside is drawn into the world of sewing.
(I'm not sure I should ask now.)
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: (Seems like they all know each other. Should I try to join the conversation?)
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: (Bibeak and Orchid... Originium crystals... Oh.)
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: (They have Oripathy too...)
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: (But they look so happy. Is it because they found a hobby they love?)
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: (...This storeroom's filled with Bibeak's materials. No wonder that operator suggested that I apply.)
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Excuse me, do you know how to knit this kind of yarn pouch? It's supposed to be a gift, but I just can't get the hang of it.
attributes.name: Serious Operator

attributes.content: The others are all busy right now, so I thought I'd ask you.
attributes.name: Serious Operator

attributes.content: Bibeak and Orchid look completely immersed in their conversations.
Alright, let me have a look.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: You mean the one in this picture, right?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: I see... it's a rather complicated pattern. Doing this on the right worktable would make things so much easier...
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Something like this?
attributes.name: Serious Operator

attributes.content: Yes. Let me try it out and see if I'm on the right track. Give me a minute.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Sure, thanks.
attributes.name: Serious Operator

attributes.content: ...Maybe this kind of yarn would give it a better sheen.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Yeah, the colors look warmer under the light. I think she'll like it.
attributes.name: Serious Operator

attributes.content: ...Stringing a few beads here will make it look—I'm not sure how to put this, but more elaborate?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Let me see...
attributes.name: Serious Operator

attributes.content: Wow. Your name's Aosta, right? Do you take orders?
attributes.name: Serious Operator

attributes.content: Huh? Yeah, I suppose. What do you ne—
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Hey, did you rip your sleeve?
attributes.name: Serious Operator

attributes.content: There's a nail sticking out here. I guess it got caught on it.
attributes.name: Serious Operator

attributes.content: It's fine. Nothing a little needlework can't fix.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Excuse me. Where are the needles?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Behind you, in the drawers... third from the top? Or was it the fourth?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Do you need any thread too? And I have more materials in the box. Help yourself.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Thanks, just the needle and thread should be fine.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Oh, you're mending your own clothes?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: It can't be easy to sew while you're still wearing it.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: How about you take off your jacket? We have plenty of materials here. You can use this table.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Come on, let me fix that hole up.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Where's the thread? There's a spool here... is this white or black? Did you have a mud-throwing party in here or what?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Hm... patterned? Not sure. Who cares, as long as it works!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Don't forget we still need some new fabric to make more clothes after this.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: And we can't cheap out on it either. I learned my lesson last year.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: That dye was awful. Gave me rashes for days.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: That's why you need to wash it a few times before wearing it.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Oh, I've always done it like this.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: This cloth is really durable. Just stitch it up a little, and it's good for a while.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: But you used the good stuff when you knitted that yarn pouch for me.
attributes.name: Serious Operator

attributes.content: That's because I was doing it for you.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: When it's a job, I want to do it right. But my own clothes are made from durable materials, with thick threads that are made to last—
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Serious Operator

attributes.content: Oh, it looks like you also got a scratch on your elbow from that nail. You didn't feel it?
attributes.name: Serious Operator

attributes.content: Just a little scrape. It's not bleeding anymore, I'll just wipe it down.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: A scratch? Let me see... yes. I always bring a few band-aids with me, because you never know when they'll come in handy.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Let me see your elbow. I have a first-aid kit with me too... Wait, why am I so used to this?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Never mind. Over here.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: You don't need to—
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: We need to disinfect it.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: ...Yes, ma'am.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Hehe.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Even a small scratch can be big problem if there's any rust on the nail and the wound's not properly disinfected.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: ...Oh? That expression looks familiar. Let me guess... you hardly think it's a wound at all, don't you?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Regardless of how you used to do things, you're on Rhodes Island now.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Make the most of your environment.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Hm... Looks good. Thanks.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: I'll get back to work then.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: I can handle the rest myself. I was watching you work, and it was supposed to be a gift from me anyway. It's not right for me to ask that of someone who just ripped their clothes AND their elbow.
attributes.name: Serious Operator

attributes.content: I'm really grateful though. Tell you what, I'll buy you a new jacket the next time we're on a mission together!
attributes.name: Serious Operator

attributes.content: Ever since I was little, I've always wanted to earn money so I could buy gifts for everyone who helped me out. And now you're one of them, my man!
attributes.name: Serious Operator

attributes.content: There's something that I've been thinking about all day.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Lay it on me.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: When you were little, did you ever think about what you wanted to be when you grew up?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Oh? Let me think... the head of the Famiglia, I guess?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Can't say I have...
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Well, for me...
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Before I ever picked up a weapon, before my dad brought me along with him...
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: I wanted to be a public official, to live a quiet and peaceful life.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Your needlework could be bolder, don't worry about ruining the cloth. It's the same for everyone at first, and even if you leave a hole there are ways to fix that.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Put your ideas into action. Don't be afraid to fail.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: You want to hide the Originium on your body? No problem, I can arrange things so no one sees it.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: But lately I've been thinking, why should we have to hide it?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I've thought about that too...
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: Let me finish this up.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: (Oh, I wanted to chat with them.)
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: (...But now I don't feel like I need to?)
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: (I've never been able to figure this stuff out.)
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Aosta?
attributes.name: Serious Operator

attributes.content: Oh, excuse me. I drifted off for a moment.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Once I'm done with this pouch, can you come help me pick out fabric to patch my jacket with?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: I want to hear what you think.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Bibeak

attributes.content: So you've come around at last.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I'm coming too!
attributes.name: Serious Operator

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Perhaps this is the way of life he wanted. Perhaps he could seize it with his own hands.
They made me take all this fabric...
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: I should make something to thank them.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: And what Bibeak said... she wants me to experiment more. She says she's glad she came out of her own shell...
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: He—llo!!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Whoa?!
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Hey, guess what I just did!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Not interested.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: I blew them all away!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Hey, don't go!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Look at this! Look who won first place!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: That's right, ME!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Winner of the 1st Rhodes Island cookie-eating contest, at 26 cookies! The undisputed champ!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: There were people willing to play along with you? And you didn't get a royal beating from the cafeteria staff? Lucky bastard.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Hey, if I ate it, it's not going to waste.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: So where's Broca?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I have to tell him what a killjoy you are!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Killjoy? Go brag to him, then. I'll be waiting for news of your victory to make the headlines of Rhodes Island Daily.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Then I'll—wait, we have a newspaper here?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: You could feature in the first issue.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: I know you're making fun of me! I'm not THAT stupid!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Whatever. Is that Broca I just saw? See ya!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Hahaha, I'm the champion!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Hahaha, look at me! Look at this drawing I made!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: What exactly is this?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: ...Whoa.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Don't you see? It shows how I beat up the thugs of the Famiglia!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Oh, come on, you can laugh, you know. It's not like this is the first time we've had people on our tail. We can always shake 'em!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: The car's right here. Stop overthinking it!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: ...Yeah.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: This place is... eerily safe.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Aosta holds the rolls of cloth samples in his hands. They're heavy, but warm and soft.
He looks towards Chiave, running off with his hair whipping around in the wind. In those strands of hair, Aosta sees true joy, not forced smiles.
Aosta steps forward.
I'll be your assistant today, Doctor.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: What do you need of me?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.options: Nothing for now, just take a seat.

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Doctor, can I have a DIY room on the ship?
attributes.name: Aosta
